name: I Wanna Be the Justice Guy
name_original: I Wanna Be the Justice Guy
description:
I Wanna Be the Justice Guy is a tribute to the infamous 2D platformer 'I Wanna Be the Guy'.

While the game's storyline is related to the previous work I Wanna Be the Best Guy 4, it's not a direct sequel.

Co-developed by Gustav and Influcca(a.k.a. Influka).

※ This game is currently available in Korean(한국어) only.
